job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the integration of human expertise with AI systems to improve the AI's performance, which falls under the broader umbrella of software development and integration to enhance an existing system.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: Participating in AI model fine-tuning sessions directly relates to the process of adapting and improving machine learning models, fitting the definition of Model Development & Fine-Tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools and methodologies, even if AI-related, are core software development activities focused on building and evaluating new functionalities.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of different capabilities (human and AI) into a support system, which is a form of software development and integration to enhance service delivery.

soft_skills.phrase: Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
soft_skills.justification: The mention of a rapid ramp-up period implies a need for quick learning and adaptability to new products and systems.

soft_skills.phrase: Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the need for self-sufficiency and problem-solving skills, indicating that the candidate must be able to overcome obstacles independently.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on integrating AI capabilities into customer resolution processes and improving AI systems ('Software Development & Integration' tasks). While there's a mention of 'AI model fine-tuning sessions', the primary emphasis is on applying human expertise to enhance existing AI systems and customer support workflows, rather than core AI model development or specialized GenAI tasks like prompt engineering or RAG. The role is about making AI work better within a broader application context.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to AI integration and improvement within a support context. The tasks lean towards enhancing existing systems rather than deep AI model creation. The profile assignment is straightforward based on this emphasis. A slightly lower score is given because the 'fine-tuning' aspect could be interpreted in multiple ways, but the overall context points strongly to an AI-adjacent role.
